```{r 1}
# Closed form solution to Bond price

bond_price <- function(alpha,beta,sigma,t,T,r){
  A <- (beta*(1-exp(-beta*(T-t))))/(alpha)
  B <- (1/beta)*((alpha-(sigma)^2/(2*beta))*(A - T +t) - (sigma^(2)*A^2)/(4))
  exp(-A*r +B)
}

```
